Item.Value: Not now sorry, I've got something on my mind. My name is $^$, and whatever it is can wait.
I love spring. Plants are blooming again after a long cold winter and it's not too hot or cold.
For me? Oh no, you shouldn't have!
Oh! I've been wanting this! Thank you so much.
Hey, $^$, what do you need?[Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Cancel]
Are you sure? I guess I can join you for an adventure today.
Sorry... I've got things to do today. Maybe later?
